Pop PHP Framework

Documentation : Ftp

Home

The Ftp component simply provides an object-oriented API wrapper to PHP's FTP extension. 

use Pop\Ftp\Ftp;

$ftp = new Ftp('ftp.yourserver.com', 'username', 'password');
$ftp->pasv(true)
    ->chdir('./httpdocs/')
    ->put('test.txt', '../assets/files/test.txt', FTP_ASCII);
echo 'File Sent!';
